definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: Michael Owen has a spring in his step after returning to training with Newcastle.
sentences.chinese: 吉文表示歐文在回到紐卡訓練後，他的恢復很好。

sentences.english: Our current contract is about to expire, and we'll need to discuss a one.
sentences.chinese: 歐文們現孕合同快要期銘濾，需要再談一各新合維。

sentences.english: This is a full-time position in Irvine , California.
sentences.chinese: 這是加州大學歐文分校生物科學院的網站。

sentences.english: Ms. Thorp fills up at a hydrogen station on the campus of the University of California at Irvine.
sentences.chinese: 索普女士在加利福吉亞大學歐文分校的加氫站加氫。

sentences.english: When he wakes up he finds that he is locked the handcuffs by the guard, Owen and electric edition disappear suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 貴仁醒來被警衛鎖上手銬，歐文及電版不翼而飛。

sentences.english: John Terry and Michael Owen of Newcastle endorse the brand.
sentences.chinese: 球員特里和歐文是其廣告代言人。

sentences.english: Will Ferguson revitalise Owen's career in much the same manner he did Eric Cantona's?
sentences.chinese: 爵爺能讓歐文的職業生像坎通納那樣涯峯迴路轉嗎？

sentences.english: Guiren determines to help Owen to solve a case together after learning the fact.
sentences.chinese: 貴仁得知後決定協助歐文一同破案。

sentences.english: The biggest story of the Berlin Olympics was American track-and-field star Jesse Owens.
sentences.chinese: 最大的故事柏林奧運會是美國田徑明星傑西歐文斯。

sentences.english: Dr. Kathryn Railly: And what we say is the truth is what everybody accepts.
sentences.chinese: 我們所說的真理是每團體都承受的，對麼，歐文？

sentences.english: How would you introduce Peter to Owen?
sentences.chinese: 你如何把彼德介紹給歐文？
歐文真能說，我根本插不上嘴。

sentences.english: But Owen is not an understudy .
sentences.chinese: 但是歐文不應該是替補演員。

sentences.english: Michael Owen admitted United were under pressure prior to a comfortable Carling Cup victory over Aldershot Town.
sentences.chinese: 歐文承認在這場聯賽盃之前曼聯承受了不小的壓力。

sentences.english: Dr. Kathryn Railly: And what we say is the truth is what everybody accepts.
sentences.chinese: 我們所說的真理是每個人都接受的，對麼，歐文？

sentences.english: Nearly everyone had something to say in reprobation of the views suggested by Owen.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每個人都說幾句話來表示反對歐文的見解。

definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
Jobs (name)/see also 史蒂夫·喬布斯|史蒂夫·乔布斯[Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1], Steve Jobs
